questiontext.text: A researcher examines whether a new form of therapy helps to treat social anxiety. In which of the following cases is regression to the mean a possible problem in interpreting results from the longitudinal intervention study?

answer.text: When there are strong individual differences in the level of social anxiety.

feedback.text: When strong individual differences exist in the degree of social anxietyâ€¦: Incorrect

answer.text: When placebo effects reduce social anxiety.

feedback.text: When placebo effects reduce social anxiety: Incorrect

answer.text: When there are changes over time in social anxiety.

feedback.text: When there are changes over time in social anxiety: Correct
